tagline: Create trackable campaign URLs with UTM parameters for analytics and marketing
pageDescription: Professional UTM link builder for marketers and analysts. Generate trackable URLs with UTM parameters (source, medium, campaign, term, content) for Google Analytics tracking. Use presets for social media (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram), email campaigns, and advertising. Save templates for recurring campaigns. Add custom parameters for advanced tracking. Export URLs in CSV format for bulk campaigns. All processing happens in your browser for complete privacy and security.

instructions.title: How to use UTM Link Builder

steps.title: Enter your destination URL
steps.description: Type or paste the webpage URL you want to track. This can be any landing page, blog post, product page, or website link where you want to measure traffic. Make sure to include the protocol (https://). Example: https://example.com/summer-sale

steps.title: Add UTM parameters
steps.description: Fill in the UTM parameters to track your campaigns. Source identifies where traffic originates (e.g., 'facebook', 'newsletter'). Medium specifies the marketing channel (e.g., 'social', 'email', 'cpc'). Campaign names your specific promotion (e.g., 'summer_sale', 'product_launch'). Term and Content are optional for paid search keywords and A/B testing variations.

steps.title: Use presets or templates
steps.description: Save time by using built-in presets for common platforms (social media, email, advertising) or create your own templates for recurring campaigns. Click 'Presets' to apply standard configurations, or 'Templates' to save and reuse custom parameter combinations for your specific marketing workflows.

steps.title: Add custom parameters (optional)
steps.description: Extend tracking with custom parameters beyond standard UTM tags. Add any key-value pair to capture additional campaign data specific to your needs. Perfect for internal tracking, advanced segmentation, or integration with custom analytics systems.

steps.title: Generate and use your UTM URL
steps.description: Click 'Generate UTM URL' to create your trackable link. Copy it to clipboard, download as text file, or test it directly in a new tab. Use the generated URL in your marketing materials, social media posts, email campaigns, or ad creatives to track performance in Google Analytics or your preferred analytics platform.

Save templates for recurring campaigns to ensure consistent tracking

troubleshooting: URL invalid error: Ensure your URL includes https:// or http:// protocol
Parameters not showing in Analytics: Wait 24-48 hours for data to appear in Google Analytics
Special characters in parameters: Avoid spaces and special symbols, use underscores or hyphens
Case sensitivity: UTM parameters are case-sensitive in Analytics - stick to lowercase
Missing required fields: At minimum, fill in URL, source, and medium for proper tracking
Template won't save: Ensure you've entered a template name before clicking Save
Parameters too long: Keep parameter values under 200 characters for compatibility
Link doesn't work when clicked: Test the base URL without parameters first to verify it's valid
